amendment.description: An amendment numbered 148 printed in Part B of House Report 116-461 to prevent the Department of Justice from using federal funds for litigation that undermines the Affordable Care Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment prevents the Department of Justice from using federal funds for litigation that undermines the Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Underwood amendment (A007) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 234 - 181 (Roll no. 175).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A007) pursuant to the rule.
